dcterms:creator: U. T. Lieu
N. Yoshinaga
dcterms:description: A dataset containing simulations of the dodecagonal quasicrystal (DDQC) formed from patchy particles, focusing on the dynamics of self-assembly and the influence of temperature control.
dcterms:title: DDQC (Dodecagonal Quasicrystal) from patchy particles

dcterms:creator: U. T. Lieu
N. Yoshinaga
dcterms:description: A dataset based on a triple-well potential model used to study the dynamics of structural changes and the influence of temperature on particle behavior.
dcterms:title: Triple-well potential model

dcterms:creator: M. Engel
H.-R. Trebin
dcterms:description: A dataset describing the dodecagonal quasicrystal (DDQC) formed from isotropically interacting particles, providing insights into the structural formation and stability.
dcterms:title: DDQC from isotropically interacting particles

dcterms:creator: S. L. Brunton
J. N. Kutz
dcterms:description: A dataset containing unknown target structures characterized by specific parameters, used to explore the dynamics of self-assembly and control mechanisms.
dcterms:title: Unknown target structures (σ ∗ = 0.65 and σ ∗ = 0.35)
